description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              - Acting as a first point of contact: dealing with correspondence and phone calls from outside & inside
              
              - Managing diaries and organizing meetings and appointments, often controlling access to General Manager
              
              - Booking and arranging travel, transport and accommodation
              
              organising events and conferences for GM
              
              - Typing, compiling, translating and preparing reports, presentations for GM
              
              - Managing databases and filing systems; collating and filing expenses
              
              - Implementing and maintaining procedures/administrative systems
              
              - Other administrative tasks assigned by GM.

requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              - Good appearance & grooming.
              
              - Bachelor degree in Korean Studies; fluency in Korean, good at English
              
              - Have experience of administration or personal assistant work.
              
              - Good communication skills; good organisational skills and the ability to multitask
              
              - Flexibility and adaptability
              

              * Benefit:
              
              - Attractive & competitive salary with high service charge.
              
              - 02 months of probation with Full salary & Service charge
              
              - Duty meal at staff canteen.
              
              - Wonderful working environment with interesting activities.
              
              - Annual vacation, Annual health check, Insurance and other welfare as in Labor Law.
